segment.source: Use the \[Proxy\] .INS file setting to define whether to use a proxy server.
segment.target: Use the \[Proxy\] .INS file setting to define whether to use a proxy server.

segment.source: Use the Proxy .INS file to specify a proxy server (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Proxy .INS file to specify a proxy server (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Proxy .INS file to specify a proxy server
segment.target: Use the Proxy .INS file to specify a proxy server

segment.source: Info about whether to use a proxy server.
segment.target: Info about whether to use a proxy server.

segment.source: If yes, this also includes the host names for the proxy server.
segment.target: If yes, this also includes the host names for the proxy server.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Value
segment.target: Value

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: FTP_Proxy_Server
segment.target: FTP_Proxy_Server

segment.source: The host name for the FTP proxy server.
segment.target: The host name for the FTP proxy server.

segment.source: Gopher_Proxy_Server
segment.target: Gopher_Proxy_Server

segment.source: We no longer support Gopher Server.
segment.target: We no longer support Gopher Server.

segment.source: HTTP_Proxy_Server
segment.target: HTTP_Proxy_Server

segment.source: The host name for the HTTP proxy server.
segment.target: The host name for the HTTP proxy server.

segment.source: Proxy_Enable
segment.target: Proxy_Enable

segment.source: 0. Don’t use a proxy server.
segment.target: 0. Don’t use a proxy server.

segment.source: 1. Use a proxy server.
segment.target: 1. Use a proxy server.

segment.source: Determines whether to use a proxy server.
segment.target: Determines whether to use a proxy server.

segment.source: Proxy_Override
segment.target: Proxy_Override

segment.source: The host name for the proxy server.
segment.target: The host name for the proxy server.

segment.source: For example, .
segment.target: For example, .

segment.source: Secure_Proxy_Server
segment.target: Secure_Proxy_Server

segment.source: The host name for the secure proxy server.
segment.target: The host name for the secure proxy server.

segment.source: Socks_Proxy_Server
segment.target: Socks_Proxy_Server

segment.source: The host name for the SOCKS proxy server.
segment.target: The host name for the SOCKS proxy server.

segment.source: Use_Same_Proxy
segment.target: Use_Same_Proxy

segment.source: 0. Don’t use the same proxy server for all services.
segment.target: 0. Don’t use the same proxy server for all services.

segment.source: 1. Use the same proxy server for all services.
segment.target: 1. Use the same proxy server for all services.

segment.source: Determines whether to use a single proxy server for all services.
segment.target: Determines whether to use a single proxy server for all services.
